perturbation.original_text:
In this Agreement, unless the context otherwise requires, the following shall have the meaning as set forth against them below:
 
“Affiliate(s)” shall mean with respect to any Party to this Agreement any entity which controls, is controlled by, or is under common
control with such Party. An entity controls another entity when it owns or controls, directly or indirectly, fifty-one percent (51%) or
more of the equity share capital issued and outstanding of the other entity or when it controls, on its own or jointly, the majority of the
composition of the Board of Directors of such other entity.
perturbation.changed_text:
In this Agreement, unless the context otherwise requires, the following shall have the meaning as set forth against them below:
 
“Affiliate(s)” shall mean with respect to any Party to this Agreement any entity which controls, is controlled by, or is under common
control with such Party. An entity oversees another entity when it owns or controls, directly or indirectly, fifty-one percent (51%) or
more of the equity share capital issued and outstanding of the other entity or when it controls, on its own or jointly, the majority of the
composition of the Board of Directors of such other entity.
perturbation.explanation: Replacing 'controls' with 'oversees' introduces a subtly different meaning, potentially conflicting with later clauses that rely on the original, stricter definition of 'control.' This creates ambiguity.

perturbation.original_text:
IMPCO shall designate one (1) of its Directors as the Managing Director (‘MD’) of the JVC in accordance with the provisions of the
Act. The MD shall have substantial powers of management of the JVC, subject to the supervision and control of the Board.
perturbation.changed_text:
IMPCO shall nominate one (1) of its Directors as the Chief Executive Officer (‘CEO’) of the JVC in accordance with the provisions of the
Act. The CEO shall have oversight responsibilities of the JVC, subject to the guidance of the Board.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Managing Director' to 'Chief Executive Officer' and 'supervision and control' to 'oversight responsibilities and guidance' dilutes the defined powers of the position. This creates confusion as 'MD' is used later.

perturbation.original_text:
The JVC will be permitted to use the following words in Products which are manufactured by MINDA IMPCO Limited. “Manufactured by
MINDA IMPCO Limited, an Indo American Joint Venture”. Subject to the provisions of this Agreement, all products, will carry the trademark
of MINDA IMPCO.
perturbation.changed_text:
The JVC will be permitted to use the following words in commodities which are produced by MINDA IMPCO Limited. “Produced by
MINDA IMPCO Limited, an Indo American Joint Venture”. Subject to the provisions of this Agreement, all goods will be labeled with
the MINDA IMPCO brand.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Products' to 'commodities'/'goods' and 'trademark' to 'brand' introduces uncertainty, as 'products' is defined earlier. The change in terminology might imply a change in scope or a different set of standards, particularly in the context of legal and regulatory compliance.
